We performed a regression analysis for unilateral climate transfer, with a shift towards warmer/drier climatic conditions, using the same climatic variables in the chosen model. In other words, we regressed the means per population per site against positive climatic transfer distance values only. In biological terms, a second-degree regression model would be plausible, but we nevertheless fitted a simple linear regression model, because the data were highly scattered and we wished to avoid artifactual overfitting.
